quote: I hated every minute of training, but I said, 'Don't quit. Suffer now and live the rest of your life as a champion.'

author: Otis Rush

author: Alfred, Lord Tennyson
quote: Tis better to have loved and lost than to never have loved at all.

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

author: Robert G. Ingersoll
quote: Happiness is not a reward - it is a consequence. Suffering is not a punishment - it is a result.

author: Maya Angelou
quote: There is no greater agony than bearing an untold story inside you.

author: Philip Dormer Stanhope, 4th Earl of Chesterfield

author: Abigail Adams

author: Michelle Obama
quote: You cannot make decisions based on fear and the possibility of what might happen.

author: Michelle Obama
quote: Always stay true to yourself and never let what somebody else says distract you from your goals.

author: Amelia Earhart
quote: Courage is the price that life exacts for granting peace.

author: Amelia Earhart

author: John Galsworthy

author: Arnold Bennett

quote: Cause sometimes, you just feel tired. Feel weak. And when you feel weak, you feel like you wanna just give up. But you gotta search within you. You gotta find that inner strength, and just pull that shit out of you. And get that motivation to not give up and not be a quitter.

author: Eminem
quote: Look, if you had one shot, or one opportunity. To seize everything you ever wanted in one moment. Would you capture it or just let it slip?

author: Harriet Tubman
quote: Every great dream begins with a dreamer. Always remember, you have within you the strength, the patience, and the passion to reach for the stars to change the world.

author: Kobe Bryant
quote: I'll do whatever it takes to win games, whether it's sitting on a bench waving a towel, handing a cup of water to a teammate, or hitting the game-winning shot.

author: Winston Churchill
quote: Kites rise highest against the wind, not with it.

author: Plato
quote: At the touch of love everyone becomes a poet.

author: Warren Buffet
quote: Chains of habit are too light to be felt until they are too heavy to be broken.

author: Cicero
quote: A room without books is like a body without a soul.

author: Søren Kierkegaard
quote: Life can only be understood backwards; but it must be lived forwards.

author: Søren Kierkegaard
quote: Life is not a problem to be solved, but a reality to be experienced.

author: Søren Kierkegaard
quote: I see it all perfectly; there are two possible situations - one can either do this or that. My honest opinion and my friendly advice is this: do it or do not do it - you will regret both.

author: Søren Kierkegaard
quote: To dare is to lose one's footing momentarily. Not to dare is to lose oneself.

author: Søren Kierkegaard
quote: The highest and most beautiful things in life are not to be heard about, nor read about, nor seen but, if one will, are to be lived.

author: Søren Kierkegaard
quote: Life has its own hidden forces which you can only discover by living.

author: Søren Kierkegaard
quote: Patience is necessary, and one cannot reap immediately where one has sown.

author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam
quote: Climbing to the top demands strength, whether it is to the top of Mount Everest or to the top of your career.

author: Osho

author: George A. Moore
quote: A man travels the world over in search of what he needs and returns home to find it.

author: George A. Moore
quote: The difficulty in life is the choice.

author: George A. Moore

author: Joseph Conrad
quote: The belief in a supernatural source of evil is not necessary. Men alone are quite capable of every wickedness.

author: Rose Kennedy

author: William Shakespeare

author: Rose Kennedy

author: Cicero

author: Washington Irving

author: Buddha

author: Maya Angelou

author: Mustafa Kemal Atatürk

author: Mustafa Kemal Atatürk

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

author: Mustafa Kemal Atatürk

author: Maya Angelou

author: Manoj Kumar Pandey

author: J. K. Rowling

author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

author: J. K. Rowling

author: Stephen Hawking

author: Mark Twain

author: Confucius

author: Confucius

author: Tupac Shakur

author: Stephen Hawking

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
quote: Nothing great was ever achieved without enthusiasm.

author: Anne Frank
quote: I see the world being slowly transformed into a wilderness; I hear the approaching thunder that, one day, will destroy us too. I feel the suffering of millions. And yet, when I look up at the sky, I somehow feel that everything will change for the better, that this cruelty too shall end, that peace and tranquility will return once more.

author: Barack Obama
quote: Keep exploring. Keep dreaming. Keep asking why. Don’t settle for what you already know. Never stop believing in the power of your ideas, your imagination, your hard work to change the world.

author: Elon Musk

author: Sun Tzu

author: Abraham Lincoln

author: Tupac Shakur

author: Marcus Aurelius

author: Saint Augustine

author: William Shakespeare

author: Michelle Obama

author: Kobe Bryant

author: Muhammad Ali

author: Buddha

author: Buddha
quote: All that we are is the result of what we have thought. The mind is everything. What we think we become.

author: George Bernard Shaw

author: George Bernard Shaw

author: George Bernard Shaw

author: George Bernard Shaw

author: George Bernard Shaw

author: Theodore Roosevelt
